item.title: Red Anthias over Coral Reef
item.description:
20190630-Red Anthias over Coral Reef
下载此壁纸（1920x1080）

Mayotte is surrounded by a typical tropical coral reef. It consists in a large outer barrier reef, enclosing one of the world's largest and deepest lagoons, followed by a fringing reef, interrupted by many mangroves.There are at least 250 different species of coral, 760 species of tropical fish, and the National Natural Heritage Inventory lists at least 3,616 marine species.
